title: What's the all caps condensed type on the wired cover with Brad Pitt?
content:
It looks a lot like good ol’ univers condensed, but the “S” looks a bit different. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090903141246/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_277.png) | 77.69 KB |
author: atarijake

comments.content: Hoefler & Frere-Jones did some custom typefaces for them about a year or two ago. It’s probably one of those.

Chris is right.

Check the Document Properties\>Fonts

Who knows what’s what tho:

[http://www.wired.com/images/press/pdf/1708cover.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20090903141246/http:/www.wired.com/images/press/pdf/1708cover.pdf "http://www.wired.com/images/press/pdf/1708cover.pdf")

Mikey :-)

PS... MVB Solano Gothic with get you close:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/solano-gothic-mvb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090903141246/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/solano-gothic-mvb/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/solano-gothic-mvb/")

@ SuperUltraFabulous: Good call on checking the true PDF cover.

TIP: If you open it in Acrobat Pro and use the ’Touchup Text Tool’ and highlight the type and right-click and get ’properties’ it will tell you the font, font-size, horz scaling, color, etc.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090903141246im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tungsten_5752.jpg)

In this case:

THE = HobokenHigh-SemiSans  
NEW RULES = Tungsten-Semibold

FOR = HobokenHigh-SemiSans  
DIGITAL GENTLEMEN = Tungsten-Medium

AND OTHER = HobokenHigh-SemiSans  
HIGHLY EVOLVED HUMANS = Tungsten-Medium

HOW TO AVOID thru BRAD PITT = Tungsten-Medium

Jeff very cool!!! Thank you for posting that info.

Mikey :-)
